Description: Foot and wall sherd of Attic black-glazed pottery salt-cellar; flat base; glazed black on interior and exterior (partly peeled); reserved: lowest part of foot and underside; inscription cut on underside.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 492)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.2175)
